channel.title: sorting on Headstone lamp - leetcode grind
channel.description: Recent content in sorting on Headstone lamp - leetcode grind

item.title: 252. Meeting Rooms
item.description: # O(n * log(n)) time || O(1) space def can_attend_meetings(self, intervals: List[List[int]]) -> bool: intervals.sort(key=lambda x: x[0]) for i in range(1, len(intervals)): if intervals[i][0] < intervals[i - 1][1]: return False return True # O(n * log(n)) time || O(1) space def can_attend_meetings_shorter(self, intervals: List[List[int]]) -> bool: intervals.sort(key=lambda x: x[0]) return all(intervals[i][0] >= intervals[i - 1][1] for i in range(1, len(intervals))) To determine whether a person can attend all meetings, we need to ensure that no two meetings overlap.
